name: Counts
body:
### What is counts? 
Counts is an open source, Apache licensed, probabilistic data-structures distributed cache and store, serving the following type of counts:
* cardinality (using HyperLogLog++): <desc here>
* purgable cardinality (using Cuckoofilter): <desc here>
* frequeny (using Count-Min-Log sketch): <desc here>
* purgable frequency (using Count-Mean-Min sketch): <desc here>
* topk (using topK): <desc here>

### Authors & Contributors 
* @seiflotfy
* @mbarkhau
* @martinpinto
